Class Player

it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
User playing a game

    Constructor of the class, Initializes a new player with a 'name' and a 'color', his status 'winner' to false, the 'area' and the 'points' to 0.

      public void disconnection()

    • place

      public boolean place(int cardIndex, boolean side, int row, int column) throws RemoteException
      Method that places the card in the space indicated, if possible
      Parameters:
      cardIndex - inter representing the position in the hand of the card to place
      row - integer indicating the row of the playground where the card would be placed
      column - integer indicating the column of the playground where the card would be placed
      Returns:
      boolean 'true' if the card was placed correctly, 'false' otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • placeable

      public boolean placeable(Card card, int row, int column)
      Checks if a card can be placed in a specific position
      Parameters:
      card - the card to check
      row - y of the position
      column - x of the position
      Returns:
      true if it's possible to place the card, false otherwise

    • checkGold

      public boolean checkGold(GoldCard card)
      Checks if the requirements to place a gold card are fulfilled
      Parameters:
      card - the gold card to check
      Returns:
      true if it's possible to place the gold card front-side, false otherwise
